711521f-a.text:
148, 6 and 4 East 19th Street, at, adjoining and west of the S. W. corner of Third Avenue. No. 148 is the 3-story corner hotel and saloon and is only partially shown. This also bears No. 222
Third Avenue.
About 1915
Gift of E. M. Jenks

708020f-a.text:
(1)
Third Ave., east side, north from East 19th Street, showing the Third Ave. Elevated Line. Also seen (in the background), is the Chrysler Building. Note the Christmas trees displayed on the sidewalk.
1December 23, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from a point several feet northward.
DDecember 23, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
